music21.test.dedent¶

Functions¶

music21.test.dedent.dedent(string)¶
>>> from music21.test.dedent import dedent
>>> msg = '    Hello\n    There\n        My friend\n    Hi!'
>>> print(msg)
    Hello
    There
        My friend
    Hi!
>>> out = dedent(msg)
>>> print(out)
Hello
There
    My friend
Hi!
